verses.name: Jonah 2:1
verses.text: Then Jonah prayed unto the Lord his God out of the fish’s belly,

verses.name: Jonah 2:2
verses.text: And said, I cried by reason of mine affliction unto the Lord, and he heard me; out of the belly of hell cried I, and thou heardest my voice.

verses.name: Jonah 2:3
verses.text: For thou hadst cast me into the deep, in the midst of the seas; and the floods compassed me about: all thy billows and thy waves passed over me.

verses.name: Jonah 2:4
verses.text: Then I said, I am cast out of thy sight; yet I will look again toward thy holy temple.
